sentence.Network_en: They are clamorous for better pay.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们吵吵嚷嚷要求增加工资.

sentence.Network_en: The clamorous hunger in his belly seemed to justify him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他肚中的辘辘饥肠似乎就是他的理由.

sentence.Network_en: The waterfall seemed unusually clamorous too.
sentence.Network_cn: 而瀑布也似乎分外的.向了.

entry.tran: 吵吵嚷嚷的;吵闹的;大喊大叫的
entry.def: If you describe people or their voices as clamorous, you mean they are talking loudly or shouting.

means.word_mean: 1. conspicuously and offensively loud; given to vehement outcry;
